designs.name: Urban Garden Balcony
designs.description: Green and refreshing sit-out space with a city garden feel
designs.flooring: Wooden deck tiles or outdoor anti-skid tiles
designs.walls: Vertical garden wall or green panels
designs.ceiling: Open sky or pergola with creepers
designs.furniture: Outdoor chairs, coffee table, planter stands
designs.decor: Potted plants, hanging planters, fairy lights
designs.prompt_keywords: urban garden balcony, green sit out, city balcony makeover

designs.name: Cozy Café Style Balcony
designs.description: Relaxed café-inspired sit-out for morning coffee and evening chats
designs.walls: Warm neutral walls with art frames
designs.prompt_keywords: cafe style balcony, cozy sit out, coffee balcony design

designs.name: Minimal Modern Balcony
designs.description: Clean and contemporary balcony with simple aesthetics
designs.prompt_keywords: modern balcony design, minimalist sit out, clean outdoor space

designs.name: Boho Relaxed Balcony
designs.description: Casual, artistic balcony with bohemian charm
designs.prompt_keywords: boho balcony, relaxed sit out, artistic outdoor space

designs.name: Coastal Breeze Balcony
designs.description: Fresh and airy balcony inspired by coastal living
designs.prompt_keywords: coastal balcony, beach sit out, airy outdoor design

designs.name: Zen Meditation Balcony
designs.description: Peaceful sit-out designed for relaxation and meditation
designs.prompt_keywords: zen balcony, meditation sit out, calm outdoor space

designs.name: Luxury Lounge Balcony
designs.description: Premium balcony lounge with elegant seating and lighting
designs.flooring: Wood deck or premium outdoor tiles
designs.prompt_keywords: luxury balcony lounge, premium sit out design

designs.name: Family-Friendly Balcony
designs.description: Safe and functional sit-out space for family use
designs.prompt_keywords: family balcony, functional sit out, safe outdoor design

designs.name: Tropical Retreat Balcony
designs.description: Lush tropical balcony resembling a resort escape
designs.prompt_keywords: tropical balcony, resort style sit out, lush greenery

designs.name: Compact Utilitarian Balcony
designs.description: Space-efficient balcony design with practical usage
designs.prompt_keywords: small balcony design, compact sit out, space saving balcony
